tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE quantum_research_projects (
 project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 project_name VARCHAR,
 researcher_name VARCHAR,
 start_date DATE,
 end_date DATE,
 research_status VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE quantum_research_projects (
    project_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    project_description TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE quantum_experiments (
    experiment_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    experiment_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    experiment_description TEXT,
    project_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES quantum_research_projects(project_id)
);

CREATE TABLE experiment_progress (
    experiment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_id INT,
    experiment_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    experiment_description TEXT,
    progress_percent INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES quantum_research_projects(project_id)
);

CREATE TABLE projects (
  project_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  project_name STRING,
  project_description STRING,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE experiments (
  experiment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  project_id UUID,
  researcher_id UUID,
  experiment_description STRING,
  experiment_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE projects (
  project_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  project_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  project_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE experiments (
  experiment_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  experiment_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  experiment_description TEXT
);
